lead_paragraph: Jake Peavy walked off the mound to a standing ovation from a spirited Fourth of July crowd, and that felt a whole lot better than the boos fired his way at times this season.

headline.print_headline: Pagan, Posey Hit Homers as Giants Beat Rockies Behind Peavy
headline.main: Pagan, Posey Hit Homers as Giants Beat Rockies Behind Peavy

snippet: Jake Peavy walked off the mound to a standing ovation from a spirited Fourth of July crowd, and that felt a whole lot better than the boos fired his way at times this season....
